title: Outfits That Add Color to Your Wardrobe - WSJ.com
text: Outfits That Add Color to Your Wardrobe With this season's vibrant palette of offerings, happiness is finding an ensemble in every hue. Photography by Brett Lloyd; Styling by Ondine Azoulay Scroll FIRST BLUSH Layer translucent pieces with sweet pastels. From left: Max Mara jumpsuit and bodysuit, price upon request, and shoes, $635, Max Mara, 813 Madison Avenue, New York, We Love Colors tights (worn throughout), $8, welovecolors​.com; Proenza Schouler tunic, $1,090, top, $1,550, skirt, price upon request, and shoes, $725, Proenza Schouler, 121 Greene Street, New York; Missoni shirt, $1,260, bodysuit, $1,260, and skirt, $2,455, 1009 Madison Avenue, New York, Fendi bra, price upon request, fendi.com, and Tibi shoes, $475, tibi​.com.
